name: LostKeyboard
description:
Game created during the GGJ 2021

Theme : Lost & Found

You accidentally broke your keyboard while hitting your computer with it. Somehow, your keyboard is now virtual but you lost your keys. Found them to complete your keyboard !

You start with your mouse and Z button to go straight forward. You will unlock others keys during your journey.

Credits: 

Developers :

  • Romain Castel
  • Alphonse Deniau
  • Maxime Geider

Graphistes :

  • Guilhem Forgeau
  • Laurie De Faria

Sorry for the music, it was broken with the keyboard ^^

Assets used :
